import { useState } from 'react'; import { Card, CardContent } from './ui/card'; import { Badge } from './ui/badge'; import { Button } from './ui/button'; import { Tabs, TabsList, TabsTrigger, TabsContent } from './ui/tabs'; import { AlertTriangle, CheckCircle, Clock, Camera, Shield, Bell, TrendingUp } from 'lucide-react'; interface Alert { id: string; title: string; message: string; timestamp: string; date: string; time: string; camera_id: string; camera_name: string; weapon_type: string; confidence: number; isRead: boolean; severity: 'critical' | 'high' | 'medium' | 'low'; } const mockAlerts: Alert[] = [ { id: 'ALT-001', title: 'Detecci√≥n de Arma de Fuego', message: 'Se detect√≥ una pistola con alta confianza en la entrada principal', timestamp: '2026-02-09 14:32:15', date: '09/02/2026', time: '14:32:15', camera_id: 'CAM-001', camera_name: 'Entrada Principal', weapon_type: 'Pistola', confidence: 0.94, isRead: false, severity: 'critical' }, { id: 'ALT-002', title: 'Detecci√≥n de Rifle', message: 'Se identific√≥ un rifle en el √°rea de estacionamiento', timestamp: '2026-02-09 13:18:42', date: '09/02/2026', time: '13:18:42', camera_id: 'CAM-005', camera_name: 'Estacionamiento Norte', weapon_type: 'Rifle', confidence: 0.87, isRead: false, severity: 'critical' }, { id: 'ALT-003', title: 'Objeto Sospechoso Detectado', message: 'Se detect√≥ un cuchillo en el pasillo norte', timestamp: '2026-02-09 12:05:28', date: '09/02/2026', time: '12:05:28', camera_id: 'CAM-012', camera_name: 'Pasillo Norte - Piso 2', weapon_type: 'Cuchillo', confidence: 0.76, isRead: false, severity: 'high' }, { id: 'ALT-004', title: 'Detecci√≥n de Arma de Fuego', message: 'Pistola detectada en el √°rea de recepci√≥n', timestamp: '2026-02-09 11:44:11', date: '09/02/2026', time: '11:44:11', camera_id: 'CAM-003', camera_name: 'Recepci√≥n Principal', weapon_type: 'Pistola', confidence: 0.91, isRead: true, severity: 'high' }, { id: 'ALT-005', title: 'Objeto Sospechoso', message: 'Se detect√≥ un objeto sospechoso en la salida trasera', timestamp: '2026-02-09 10:22:33', date: '09/02/2026', time: '10:22:33', camera_id: 'CAM-008', camera_name: 'Salida de Emergencia', weapon_type: 'Objeto sospechoso', confidence: 0.68, isRead: true, severity: 'medium' }, { id: 'ALT-006', title: 'Detecci√≥n de Arma de Fuego', message: 'Pistola detectada nuevamente en entrada principal', timestamp: '2026-02-09 09:15:47', date: '09/02/2026', time: '09:15:47', camera_id: 'CAM-001', camera_name: 'Entrada Principal', weapon_type: 'Pistola', confidence: 0.82, isRead: true, severity: 'high' }, { id: 'ALT-007', title: 'Detecci√≥n Cr√≠tica', message: 'M√∫ltiples armas detectadas en el √°rea de estacionamiento', timestamp: '2026-02-09 08:33:22', date: '09/02/2026', time: '08:33:22', camera_id: 'CAM-005', camera_name: 'Estacionamiento Norte', weapon_type: 'Rifle', confidence: 0.96, isRead: false, severity: 'critical' }, { id: 'ALT-008', title: 'Objeto Sospechoso', message: 'Objeto no identificado en zona de cafeter√≠a', timestamp: '2026-02-09 07:18:45', date: '09/02/2026', time: '07:18:45', camera_id: 'CAM-006', camera_name: 'Cafeter√≠a', weapon_type: 'Objeto sospechoso', confidence: 0.65, isRead: true, severity: 'low' }, ]; export function Alerts() { const [alerts, setAlerts] = useState(mockAlerts); const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState<'all' | 'unread' | 'read'>('all'); const markAsRead = (id: string) => { setAlerts(alerts.map(alert => alert.id === id ? { ...alert, isRead: true } : alert )); }; const markAllAsRead = () => { setAlerts(alerts.map(alert => ({ ...alert, isRead: true }))); }; const filteredAlerts = alerts.filter(alert => { if (activeTab === 'unread') return !alert.isRead; if (activeTab === 'read') return alert.isRead; return true; }); const unreadCount = alerts.filter(a => !a.isRead).length; const readCount = alerts.filter(a => a.isRead).length; const criticalCount = alerts.filter(a => a.severity === 'critical').length; const getSeverityConfig = (severity: string) => { switch (severity) { case 'critical': return { badge: 'bg-rose-600 text-white', cardBorder: 'border-l-4 border-l-rose-500', cardBg: 'bg-gradient-to-r from-rose-50/80 to-white', icon: , iconBg: 'bg-rose-100', label: 'üî¥ Cr√≠tica', pulseEffect: 'animate-pulse' }; case 'high': return { badge: 'bg-orange-600 text-white', cardBorder: 'border-l-4 border-l-orange-500', cardBg: 'bg-white', icon: , iconBg: 'bg-orange-100', label: 'üü† Alta', pulseEffect: '' }; case 'medium': return { badge: 'bg-amber-600 text-white', cardBorder: 'border-l-4 border-l-amber-500', cardBg: 'bg-white', icon: , iconBg: 'bg-amber-100', label: 'üü° Media', pulseEffect: '' }; default: return { badge: 'bg-slate-600 text-white', cardBorder: 'border-l-4 border-l-slate-400', cardBg: 'bg-white', icon: , iconBg: 'bg-slate-100', label: '‚ö™ Baja', pulseEffect: '' }; } }; const AlertCard = ({ alert }: { alert: Alert }) => { const config = getSeverityConfig(alert.severity); return (
